price: 32 Dis : « Obéissez à Allah et au Messager. » S’ils se détournent, qu’ils sachent qu’Allah n’aime pas les impies.
arabic: قُلۡ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلرَّسُولَۖ فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qul aṭīʿū al-laha wal-rasūla fa-in tawallaw fa-inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu al-kāfirīna
